analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BChain.buyCore (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#892-941):
	External calls:
	- _eventData_ = endRound(_eventData_) (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#914-915)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- plyr_ (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#939-940)

Reentrancy in BChain.core (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#998-1062):
	External calls:
	- _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_rID,_eth,_team,_eventData_) (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1052-1056)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- plyrRnds_ (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1056-1058)
	- plyr_ (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1056-1058)
	- round_ (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1056-1058)

Reentrancy in BChain.endRound (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1326-1401):
	External calls:
	- Divies.deposit.value(_glk)() (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1369)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rID_ (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1393)
	- round_ (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1373-1374)

	- round_ (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1400)

BChain.airDropPot_ (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#159) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getCurrentRoundInfo (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#811-847)
	- endTx (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1582-1611)
NameFilter.nameFilter (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1765-1863) is declared view but contains assembly code

BChain.airdrop (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1426-1446) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (seed - ((seed / 1000) * 1000)) < airDropTracker_ (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1445-1446)

NameFilter.nameFilter uses assembly (/unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1765-1863)
	- /unique_chucks/30/0x97cf6ad3346fa218265645d82c53206f3b740bdf.sol#1860-1863
